articles.author: MoneyDJ
articles.title: 特斯拉摔至 10 個月新低，女股神伍德逆勢加碼
articles.description:
美國電動車巨頭特斯拉（Tesla）近來接連遭分析師唱衰，股價今（2024）年來重摔逾三成至 10 個月來新低，有「女股神」之稱的方舟投資創辦人凱薩琳伍德（Cathie Wood）趁機逢低加碼。

articles.title: Tesla is raising Model Y prices in the U.S. and Europe even as a China price war rages
articles.description: Elon Musk’s Tesla will increase the price of its Model Y in both the U.S. and Europe, a slight uptick that comes even as it wages a price war against its Chinese rival BYD and other EV competitors in that market.Read more...
